name: ReKindle!
description:
ReKindle! is an exciting platformer where you can use your "Kindle" ability to dash off unlit lanterns. Think carefully about which lantern to use kindle on since lanterns light up once they are kindled. 

Note: Doesn't work very well on Safari. Use Chrome or Firefox instead.

Gameplay and Controls

  • Use A and D to move left and right and press space to jump
  • When you're near enough to a lantern, it glows orange. If so, you can hold down the left mouse button to stop time
  • While time is stopped you can choose the direction of an arrow that appears on screen with your mouse
  • Release the mouse button to dash off in the direction of the arrow. If you want to exit the time stop state without dashing, press the right mouse button
  • Enemies can only be killed when you dash into them after a Kindle
  • Press 'R' to restart at any time
